info.title: Whatspie Saas API
info.description:
# Whatspie API Documentation

Welcome to Whatspie API Documentation this documentation describe all Whatspie Feature in Restfull API. To using this APIs you need to add token on every request, you can grab your token from **Profile**

post.description:
This endpoint is used to send messages of different types.

**1. Sending Text Message:**
Send a simple text message.

**2. Sending File Message:**
Send a document file.

**3. Sending Image Message:**
Send an image file.

**4. Sending List Message:**
Send a message containing a list.

**5. Sending Location Message:**
Send a message with geographical location.

**6. Sending Template Message:**
Send a message using a predefined template.

post.description: This API to check is phone number registered as WhatsApp number. This API only available on *STARTUP* Package. to use this function you must re-pair your device first to recieved this update

tags.name: Group
tags.description: This API is to interac with Whatsapp group function such as: Creating Group, Send Message to group, get group member and etc. This functin only available on STARTUP Package
